<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/csharp/02_simple/source.cs">
using System;
namespace Constructs.Simple02
public class BankAccount
    public dynamic BalanceChanged;
    public readonly string AccountNumber;
    public readonly decimal Balance;
    public void BankAccount(string accountNumber, decimal openingBalance)
    public void Deposit(decimal amount)
    public void Withdraw(decimal amount)
    public override string ToString()
public struct Money
    public void Money(decimal amount, string currency)
    public readonly decimal Amount;
    public readonly string Currency;
    public bool Equals(other Money)
    public override int GetHashCode()
    public override string ToString()
public class SavingsAccount : BankAccount
    public readonly decimal InterestRate;
    public void SavingsAccount(string accountNumber, decimal interestRate, decimal openingBalance)
    public void AddMonthlyInterest()
</file>
